content: *note* while the source above is listed as spring 2019 when you go to the malabrigo newsletter site the issue is listed as summer 2019 to download pdf click on the picture of the summer 2019 newsletter and select featured pattern - knit from the download menu bulky lace knits up quickly to make the most of one beautiful skein of the luscious rasta the construction allows it to stand up close to the neck providing warmth and the front increases create a flare to sit nicely across the chest and shoulders stitches used k p k2tog sl yo skp sk2p ssk-pssf-sl1 this is explained and there is a video for it yarn one skein of rasta in valentina measurements circumference 22 5″/57cm at neck 32 5″/82 5cm at hem height 11″/28cm in front 8 5″/21 5cm in back
